name: Bible Bingo App
description:
Fun game filled with 50 popular Bible verses. Great game for Sunday school classes. Replaces traditional printed, paper bingo cards.
Bible Bingo is designed to be played in intimate setting like Sunday school, Vacation Bible School, Disciple Now events.
Choose "Host" to read verses in play.
Choose "Game" to play bingo. Player cards are randomly generated, so chances are no two players will have the exact same card. No limit on number of players. Touch screen to "X" out verse if called; continue on until someone calls "BINGO"

Study room added with flash cards for verse memorization. Great way to learn Bible verses and have fun too! Hope you enjoy it! Please feel free to leave feedback. Kind words as well as constructive criticism welcome.
